name: straw
text: I mean, I know what you're saying and you're right too, but the way you say things around here... I just don't know, man.

name: unquotable
text: it's just off is what it is

name: badganjil
text: Oh, that's why.

name: badganjil
text: A comment left by badganjil was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, NDCaesar, fattypneumonia)

name: centipede_damascus
text: So Chris's grandmother sounds a lot like Ray's mom.

name: luckypyjamas
text: except i'm sure chris never yelled at his grandmother about how his friends wanted to kiss molly ringwold's titties

name: straw
text: You don't know that.

name: red_dawn
text: Oh! That's good!

name: hellofyellin
text: I know!  It's Important!

name: satellitetv
text: Philippe has a job?

name: killingthejay
text: he does if onstad's grandmother thinks he should

name: anathan
text: My heavens! Of course Phillipe has a job. We must all stay active and contribute to society. Why, listen to how I'm yammering away! Things to do, things to do...

name: leon_sumbitches
text: Interesting when we go from a stripper bar to a sleek haired téodor and innocent philippe talking about family and church on account of onstad's grandmother.

name: deusoma
text: To be fair, Phillipe was already pretty innocent.

name: gumfish
text: God bless.

name: myrmidon101
text: A comment left by myrmidon101 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Overmedicated, gormster, toughasnails001)

name: tristanhw
text: Does this mean no more hella yellin about the sex?

name: tim_simmons
text: chubby becuase your avatar made me laugh

name: professorhazard
text: Seconded

name: envika
text: This strip actually raises an interesting question. If interviews are to be believed, almost all of Onstad's income comes from Achewood. It's only inevitable that his mother and/or grandmother will, at some point, ask what his job is. When he says that he writes a comic, wouldn't his mother/grandmother DEFINITELY start reading it? Support your own child, you know...

name: semiquaver
text: He is in a Time Magazine Top Ten List. At the Top. I get in Time Magazine in such a fashion, the hell my mama gonna care what it is for.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Just don't get in Time Magazine like this

name: gompo
text: Hitler was very close to his mother, who spoiled him throughout his life, as he was her only son who survived.  It's hard to say what she would have thought of her son had she survived to see what he became, but it's difficult to believe she wouldn't have been proud.

name: tekende
text: Yeah, most of his villainy only became apparent after his death. There's a good chance that his mother wouldn't even have known about the whole Holocaust thing as it was happening, and even if she would have known, who can say she wouldn't have supported it?

name: haschel47
text: That was probably his inspiration for the strip where Mrs. Smuckles tries to purchase the testicles for her cell phone.

name: coco
text: Would Onstad's grandmother not approve of Philippe's old shoes??

name: direhaggis
text: If it weren't Phillipe who was in the panel, I'd swear Teodor was trying to make a drug transaction with that wily church code of his.

name: wurlitzergirl
text: Is anyone else reminded of The Freshman ?

name: jonmw
text: For a moment, I was confused. I was thinking of The Graduate . I was having trouble understanding the relevance.

name: despairigus
text: I thought grammas like to get boned, too.

name: dipstikk
text: The toughest part about working on anything for an artist is keeping your work away from your parents.

name: tonyhighwind
text:
5 5 5 5 5 5 5

I have never stopped laughing at this strip. It sounds painful, but I eventually just made a certain part of my brain keep laughing in my head all day every day.

It makes conversation difficult.

name: miaou
text:
- So, do you want to get up being 5 tomorrow, or turn 6?
- Oh, better make it five!
